alert.note: Alert for Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:38PM EDT until July 18 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lexington County in central South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 438 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Bank, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Lexington, Cayce, Red Bank, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Pelion, Gilbert, Summit, Lexington County Airport At Pelion, Bundrick Island, Peachtree Rock, Edmund, Camp Kinard, Steedman, Barr Lake, Samaria Fire Station, Red Bank Sports Complex, Cedar Pond Campground, Kneece and Murray. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 38 and 57. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
